skillTree.localised_description: A warrior's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast â€“ a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The special armour crafted for the Golden Knight wraps wounded Kislevites in a protective coating of ice when their life becomes threatened, shielding them from further harm.
Called into existence by the flashing ice of the Golden Knight's enchanted sword, this icy heat freezes the foes of the motherland, imbued will all of the terrible chill of Kislev made real.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: Naryaska Leysa wields the fighting techniques of her ancient and distinguished family line with consumate skill, overwhelming any who stand in her way.
While the Golden Knight stands betwixt Tzarina and enemies, Kislev shall never fall, and nor shall the Golden Knight.
Despite their training, there is always something that even the Guards can learn from a warrior as skilled as Naryaska Leysa.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Guardian" for Ice Guard and Tzar Guard units.
	(all units in army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Forged by melding the hearthfires of Dazh and the icy cold of the Kislevite winter, this sword warms allies who are within its reach while biting deep into those who stand in its way.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Golden Knight is the champion of the Tzarina, and an honourary title bestowed upon the greatest warrior of Kislev. Naryaska Leysa is the current holder, and said to be an even greater warrior than her father, who held the title before relinquishing it to his daughter.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for Ice Guard units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +8 for Tzar Guard units
	(all units in army)
